# kvlm-section

A layout component to wrap sections of the page.

## Slots

| Name | Description      |
|------|------------------|
|      | The default slot |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                         | Description                     |
|----------------------------------|---------------------------------|
| `--kvlm-section-background-from` | Background gradient start color |
| `--kvlm-section-background-to`   | Background gradient end color   |
| `--kvlm-section-color`           | Color of the content            |
